statement.title: Standard Input
statement.content:
There are multiple test cases. The first line of input contains an integer T, indicating the number of test cases. 

For each test caseï¼ŒThe first line contains two integers $n$ and $m$ $(1\le n,m\le 100)$ -- the number of rows and column. For the next n lines,each line two integers $L_i,R_i(1\le L_i\le R_i\le m)$.

statement.title: Standard Output
statement.content: For each test case, output the min minimum number of chessmans he should place.

statement.content:
